about_me.des: My research interests include - reinforcement learning, real-time machine learning, neuroscience and robotics. I am interested in applying reinforcement learning and representation learning algorithms on real-world settings and robots. My thesis is on learning from demonstration: Teaching a prosthetic arm using an intact arm via actor-critic reinforcement learning

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It's pretty minimal, but leverages large type and drastic contrast to make a statement, on all devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.tiadc: This project aims at developing an autonomous vacuum cleaning method which can be used on a regular basis to maximize the lifetime and efficiency of a solar panel. This work was presented at the Texas Instruments Educators Conference India 2014
projects.rl: This repository has basic code for a few Reinforcement Learning (RL) algorithms.
projects.hex: A Deep Q-Learning implementation for the game of Hex: after supervised initialization, we use selfplay to train NeuroHex, an 11-layer CNN that plays Hex on the 13x13 board. Hex is the classic two-player alternate-turn stone placement game played on a rhombus of hexagonal cells in which the winner is whomever connects their two opposing sides. Despite the large action and state space, our system trains a Q-network capable of strong play with no search.
projects.ardrone: Autonomous Landing of Quadcopter on a Moving Platform. The videos below are a demonstration of Oriented Roundel Tracking and Point to Point Control.
projects.bento: Mirrored Bilateral training for simultaneous control of a Myo-electric Prostheses via Actor Critic Reinforcement Learning. (In progress)
projects.mslesion: Multiple Sclerosis Lesion Segmentation in MRI Images - Supervised learning is used to classify every voxel of the MRI images as healthy or scar tissue
projects.openai: This git repo has my experiments with Open AI Gym. It's a great platform to compare the performance of Reinforcement Learning algorithms.

career.nextcode_des: Now I am in Nextcode and develop website with Python code for genetic analysis.
career.netease_des: In Netease game, I learned game service system and use Python code for ops.
career.ms_des: I'm currently pursuing a Masters degree in Computing Science at the University of Alberta, Canada. I work under the supervision of Dr. Patrick Pilarski on Reinforcement Learning for Medical Prostheses
career.college: B.Tech in Instrumentation and Control Engineering
career.college_des: Graduated from National Institute of Technology (NIT), Tiruchirappalli, India in May 2015.
